items.content_html: Copy Tab URLs: A Chrome extension that simplifies copying URLs from multiple tabs. With one click, copy URLs from all open tabs or just the current window. Features include automatic URL formatting, real-time feedback, and usage statistics. Streamline your browsing workflow with this lightweight, user-friendly tool.
items.title: draeician/copy-tab-urls-chrome: Copy Tab URLs: A Chrome extension that simplifies copying URLs from multiple tabs. With one click, copy URLs from all open tabs or just the current window. Features include automatic URL formatting, real-time feedback, and usage statistics. Streamline your browsing workflow with this lightweight, user-friendly tool.

items.content_html: A simple slider-based CAPTCHA implemented in vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Users must follow specific sliding instructions to verify they are human, providing a lightweight alternative to traditional CAPTCHA systems.
items.title: Mgregchi/slidecaptcha: A simple slider-based CAPTCHA implemented in vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Users must follow specific sliding instructions to verify they are human, providing a lightweight alternative to traditional CAPTCHA systems.

items.content_html: The image-effect-renderer is lightweight package that allows you to run fragment shaders in your website using WebGL. It can be used to apply effects to HTML image or video sources. Zero dependencies.
items.title: mediamonks/image-effect-renderer: The image-effect-renderer is lightweight package that allows you to run fragment shaders in your website using WebGL. It can be used to apply effects to HTML image or video sources.  Zero dependencies.
